title: A Faraway Goal
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Uuu, Eli-san, this.... might be it for me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>What are you saying? You can do it, Shizuku. Come on, we’re almost there, so just hang on! That tree is our goal!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Uuuu~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Come on, let’s cross the goal together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>O-, okay~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>*Huff*, *Huff*.... I thought I was done for. You guys always do such harsh training, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Well, umm.... Umi put a lot of effort into this training plan, so it’s special. Look, we have tasted the finest bubble drink, haven’t we? To that end, we have to burn the same amount of calories.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah.... If we move around more, we can enjoy the cheese bubble milk tea with extra bubbles once again.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s right. We just have to do this course 3 more times!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeeeeeh!? The road to bubble drinks is such a long one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
